person.note: Lu Dian [8098] Posthumously purged as Yuanyou coalition member. Gui's [7049] son, Qi's [7048] nephew, Bi's [7051] and Zhuan's [7297] brother, Zhi's [1284] and Zai's [1288] father, Bian(1) Xun's [7061] son-in-law, brother of Shi(4) Jingxi [7332]'s mother. His fifth son Bao's [3637] father-in-law was Xu(3) Junping [750]. Lu(5) Huan [1285] has the same generational name as his grandsons and grandnephews. SS(PRC), 343.10917; Lu You, WJ, 32.2b; Liangzhe jinshi zhi, 10.21a. CBD, 3, 2649.

desc.desc: Listed in Yuanyou coalition register (元祐黨)Supportive political association
入元祐黨籍者政治奧援

desc.label: 博極群書，文辭高古，陸佃每愛其詩，列為上客。
越州新昌人 徽之子 與弟景愈、景完、景洙從陸佃於太學 粢食不美 夜分寒燈熒然
諸暨人 少與黃彥、朱戩同遊陸佃之門 佃為鄆州州學教授 羽及彥、戩不憚跋涉之勞
衢州人 與鄭褎共遊陸佃之門 從遊最久
衢州人 與鄭云同遊陸佃之門 為從遊最久者
王氏夫人墓誌銘(陶山集15/172)
